resources.string: You are in out of service area of location service!
The status of location information is unknown.
We\'ll receive all notifications, regardless of location.\nTo discard far notifications, please enable the location service.
Location service has been enabled now.
The connection with the server has been lost.
If you suspect a server problem, please contact the developer.
AED operation has been started. Probably support for lifesaving is required!.
Tap here to check the location.
Need support for lifesaving within the set range\nPlease cooperate with lifesaving!\nTap to check the location.
No further lifesaving support is required. Thank you very much to your cooperation.
This application can know where are you to determine whether to receive notifications.\nThis application never sends the location to the outside, such as AEDs, the CPRSS Server.
"Permission to get location information is needed. "

In this application, the information to be notified is selected using the location information to obtain only the surrounding information.
Please allow location information acquisition in the dialog displayed on the next screen.
If rejected, the application will be terminated.
The connection with the server has been restored.
The application will be terminated because processing cannot continue.\nPlease allow the location permission and restart to continue the service.
Tap below contents to check the location of the AED.
Long tap here to check the location via Map application.
Duration to determine as \"a little late\"
